title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Implemented Flask and JavaScript to create responsive web elements and server-side logic, enhancing application performance through streamlined data handling and API integration, while leading the development of an AI NLP web application using React, Flask, and JavaScript, focusing on full-stack optimization for improved system architecture and user experience.

title: Software Developer
description: Played a pivotal role in the successful sale of an Alaskan business by enhancing its online presence and profitability through effective SEO and website optimization, leading to higher search rankings and increased user engagement, and utilized Python, R, and SQL for market and customer behavior analysis, providing insights that informed marketing strategies and business improvement.

title: Speech Recognition and Aanalysis Specialist
description: Developed a Python and JavaScript-based NLP console application for analyzing speech patterns and identifying speakers in recorded conversations, integrating an API for precise audio transcription and timing to facilitate accurate speech analysis and speaker identification.

title: Data Analyst
description: Engineered a data analysis system to optimize employee retention and tip distribution by automating analysis pipelines and developing a web-based data management platform, coupled with extensive statistical analysis using Python, R, and SQL to identify key factors affecting employee satisfaction and tip impacts.
